SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
FurtherGroupTests
The methods in this class further test the Group class.
Group
This is the Group class Represents a group of teams in the tournament Implements the IGroup interface
GroupMatch
This is the GroupMatch class Represents a match between two teams Implements the IGroupMatch interface
GroupMatchTests
 
GroupTests
The methods in this class test the Group class.
IGroup
Each group consists of four teams, indexed 0-3.
IGroupMatch
Interface for a single match between two teams.
IMatchTree
This interface describes how other code interacts with a set of matches in an elimination competition.
IPlayer
This interface should be implemented by classes representing players in teams.
ITeam
This interface must be implemented by any class representing a team of players.
ITreeNode
This interface must be implemented by classes representing nodes in the binary tree of teams that makes up the competition.
Main
This is the Main class Takes user input for team and player details, and scores Divides the number of teams into groups, and runs the group matches Uses the winner from each group in the knockout tournament stage Contains error-checking where necessary
MatchTree
This is the MatchTree class Contains an implementation of a binary tree structure Used to organise matches Implements the IMatchTree interface
MatchTreeConstructionTests
 
MatchTreeTests
 
Player
This is the Player class The objects of this class represent an individual player on a team Holds the player's name and position number Implements the IPlayer interface
PlayerTests
 
Team
This is the Team class The objects of this class represent a team of players Implements the ITeam interface
TeamTests
 
TreeNode
This is the TreeNode class Contains methods to set and get the data Implements the ITreeNode interface
TreeNodeTests
 
TreePrinter
Binary tree printer
